data.name: Bonus Saver
data.description: Enjoy bonus interest when you deposit $20 or more in to your Bonus Saver Account and make 5 or more eligible VISA Debit card transactions from your linked account each month. Take your money out as often as you need without losing the bonus interest you've already earned.

bundles.name: Linked MyState Bank Glide Account or Basic Account
bundles.description: Enjoy bonus interest when an eligible deposit $20 or more in to your Bonus Saver Account and make 5 or more eligible VISA Debit card transactions from your linked account each month.
bundles.additionalInfo: Eligible deposit and Visa transaction are described on our web site.

features.additionalInfo: Stay flexible anywhere and anytime with the MyState Bank app
Receive money in less than 60 seconds.
Receive money in less than 60 seconds. Add your mobile number or email address as a PayID and use this in place of your BSB and Account number.

eligibility.additionalInfo: The Bonus Saver Account can be opened in a personal name however it can't be opened or operated on behalf of a deceased estate, for trustee purposes, superannuation or a business name.
To be linked to a MyState Bank Glide Account, Everyday Account or Basic Account.

fees.name: Statement Replacement
fees.additionalInfo: Replacement copy of original statementPer page $5.00

depositRates.additionalValue: Enjoy bonus interest when an eligible deposit of $20 or more in to your Bonus Saver Account and make 5 or more eligible VISA Debit card transactions from your linked account each month.
depositRates.additionalInfo: Eligible deposit and Visa transactions are described on our web site.
